website_summaries.verdict: The Toshiba L7300U series of LED-backlit HDTVs offer some nice extra features and an overall solid HD picture, but there are better performing models out there for around the same price.

customer_reviews.title: Would Buy the Same TV Again
customer_reviews.text: We would buy this tv again - the picture is great, even in a very bright room. We have had company for watching the Super Bowl and the Olympics. Everyone has commented on what a sharp, good picture this tv has. Yes, the Toshiba system might be a little slower than others, but waiting an extra second or two isn't a deal-breaker for us. We only watch television and DVD's, so can't comment on gaming features and the like.
customer_reviews.author: emossman

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST BUY EVER!
customer_reviews.text: It has the best picture! I got the TV at the best price available--I THINK, and so does my family! My sister-in-law wants one just like it. My family arrived and stayed over the weekend I received the TV, and oh my goodness, we all loved it so much we wanted to sleep in front of it. I have always been a fan of Toshiba, and as usual they did not let me down. My family said the picture was so vivid it almost looked 3D. Haven't used the keyboard yet, but everything else is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Renee C. Burton

customer_reviews.title: Good TV......TV only.
customer_reviews.text: Surprising accuracy out if the box. Didn't require much calibration. Slightly below average sound, but if you're looking for quality sound most flat screens are the wrong way to go. Horrible interactive elements. I mean unusable!
customer_reviews.author: R. Austin

customer_reviews.title: Best Deal on the Market
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this TV; and I think its the best deal on the market. Yes I know reviewers are saying that it is slow however after the software updates it is near perfect. I agree the Cloud interface needs some updating but honestly if i'm not there too much as I just use the shortcut buttons on the remote. After a little bit of tweaking using recommended settings i got from Tom's Hardware; colors are perfect as well.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Hua

customer_reviews.title: Great smart TV
customer_reviews.text: Great TV, delivered on time, set up guys were helpful and courtious and carried vall the trash away. Great picture and all the "smart TV" bells and whistles work just fine. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Big Bend Slick

customer_reviews.title: Good looking TV
customer_reviews.text: This tv has a beautiful image...I love it. Clear image, wifi, classy frame and stand...etc... The only thing that worries me slightly, is an strange clicking sound this tv makes....any comments?
customer_reviews.author: Luisimako

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this TV It does exclude Amazon Prime Video viewing but we fixed that with ROKU. Still an awesome unit and would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Greg Harkins

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tv
customer_reviews.text: Some problems with delivery and set up, but were corrected by Amazon. Nice picture. I wish I could view Amazon Prime videos on it, but there doesn't seem to be a way to add that App.
customer_reviews.author: H. McCloskey

customer_reviews.title: Nice picture, good wi-fi, great TV
customer_reviews.text: Nice screen size for large room, slim, sleek, great picture quality, lots of features, and the price was good, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Don N.

customer_reviews.title: Doing great!
customer_reviews.text: TV was easy to set up on the stand Amazon helped trouble shoot making the system work with our cable provider. A little iffy on the closed caption positioning since so large but works out great!
customer_reviews.author: DR007

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: It could use more plug in's for cables, like the earlier LED TV's. I had to go out and purchase a cable "junction box" to support several sets of color coded cables that were previously pluged into the older TV. On this model you can only plug in one set of cables. My older DVD player does not have the HDMI output, but only the cables. Great way to watch football!
customer_reviews.author: B. Rowland

customer_reviews.title: ... WILL NOT NOT LAST 2 YEARS THIS IS IT WORST PRODUCT I EVERY BOUGHT AND THE SERVICE IS EVEN
customer_reviews.text: IF YOU ARE LOOKING FOR A TV THAT WILL NOT NOT LAST 2 YEARS THIS IS IT WORST PRODUCT I EVERY BOUGHT AND THE SERVICE IS EVEN WORST
customer_reviews.author: Tony L

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Still trying to figure out the TV. More technology than I'm use to.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tv itself is excellent after you get colors adjusted. Internet is slow.
customer_reviews.author: Chip Bodey

customer_reviews.title: upgraded.
customer_reviews.text: this tv isn't too bad. I use to have the 46 inch from groupon. Comes with a wireless keyboard. The screen stay lit when you turn it off for a good 5 secs which worries me if its a defect, Its a huge glare in a circular form in the middle of the tv about 6 inches in Diameter.
customer_reviews.author: James Trinh

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: TV not functionfunctional after four months Update 11th May, 2015 It's the motherboard for the Toshiba 58" that malfunctioned and to date cannot be sourced. I was trapped with purchase since I live all the way in Belize, Central America and got item sent to me hence could not readily return. The mother board particulars are as follows: -A 461C6351L22. REV: 1A RK58T 308 A51 P01A921702357 431C6351L22(-_)REV:1A 305 A51 P01A921802486 Please helpppp
customer_reviews.author: lee

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great looking picture and overall nice appearance. This was like half the price of a Samsung with similar features and I don't think I'd be twice as happy with a Samsung. Yes, the Cloud capabilities are slower than ideal, but I use a Roku for Netflix/Amazon..etc and a Roku is way cheaper than stepping up to a Samsung Smart TV. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Chase

customer_reviews.title: Will never buy toshiba again
customer_reviews.text: The biggest problems with toshiba tv is that you can never find parts. Bought a tv built in 2013 and am struggling to find a main board replacement. My repair guy told me they should have pets available for 5 years but they don't . I have two tvs and I always her issues
customer_reviews.author: D. Polizzi

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed in Toshiba Support
customer_reviews.text: After five months television totally failed. Toshiba tech-support nonexistent. Toshiba customer support gave me a claim number and a local phone number to call for service. After replacing the main circuit board and power board three times over a six-week period, Television still dead! I would expect much better service for a product costing almost $2000.00. Toshiba does not have a clue how to repair this model of television. When the television was working it had a good picture, but before long the technical people in the shop will have it longer than me.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Herzberger

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture, Nothing Else....
customer_reviews.text: Got this at a local bog-box store. The image quality is amazing. But otherwise, the apps are slow and the system does need a full unplug to be reset ( had to do this 3 times in last 3 weeks ). Audio is ok, not great. Get a soundbar ( not the toshiba one, it stinks! ).
customer_reviews.author: Nick Serafini

customer_reviews.title: great picture and cool technology
customer_reviews.text: picture quality is sharp and very bright. the tv sure has a lot of pop to it although these settings can be adjusted like on all tv's. the cloud smart tv features are particularly nice. you can access netflix and hulu which is important. widi connect also lets you stream your mobile phones content to the screen. connecting to folks with the social media apps like facebook on such a big screen is going to be interesting so we're excited to try that.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Do it All

customer_reviews.title: Never again!
customer_reviews.text: The main board went out just a few months after the one year warranty expired. This part is in such high demand that I cannot find it anywhere. I have been searching for almost a month now. I have also spoken to two tv repair technicians and they both told me that the main board on this tv goes out frequently and they also are back ordered on this part. Toshiba customer support is terrible and their website is worse. I will never buy Toshiba again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Slow!
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality and options are fantastic for this tv. Otherwise, the wifi and controls are SLOW! Netflix will freeze constantly and half the time won't load at all. Nothing else in the house has any issues so I know it's not our internet, it's the tv itself. I don't think they should consider it "smart." Very frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel McElroy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome TV, picture quality is hands down the best. And compared to other competitors this TV takes the cake. The only one thing I found I don't like is the internet brower and keyboard. But then again who really need to use a TV to check out the internet when we have laptops and tablets. Right Great buy. And best bang your my bucks
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Crap TV
customer_reviews.text: This tv is terrible. The sound sucks but worst of all it won't stay connected to the internet. Customer support is not helpful and no other device in my home has connection issues. Don't waste your money. I never write reviews but I don't want others to make the same mistake I did.
customer_reviews.author: Patrice J. Tompkins

customer_reviews.title: Never buy toshiba
customer_reviews.text: Constantly have annoying problems that require a restart. Always lagging and just a huge pain in the ass. Picture is good when it is working.
customer_reviews.author: Amy E.

customer_reviews.title: Horizantal lines and fuzzy picture
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 50" version of this TV in Sept 2013 and the picture just started intermittent horizontal lines and a fuzzy picture. Not even 3 years old!
customer_reviews.author: YoGabbaGabba

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on this Tv
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money on this Tv.it deserve no rate or a minus rate.this TV freezes, infrared remote dont work well and will make you think your battery in the remote control is dead.if u ever get this T.V. for $1 buy it because i think thats how much its worth.
customer_reviews.author: Leonidez

customer_reviews.title: Clunky smart interface, but I use chromecast
customer_reviews.text: Clunky smart interface, but I use chromecast, or laptop plugged directly into the TV. Great picture, really enjoy watching movies now!
customer_reviews.author: Michal S.

product_meta.title: Toshiba 65L7300U 65-inch 1080p 120Hz Smart LED HDTV with Built-in WiFi
product_meta.description:
Smart, ultra-slim and cloud-connected, the Toshiba L7300U series LED Cloud TVs combine advanced features and sophisticated modern design, with an elegant gun metal finish and frame stand. Complete with 1080p Full HD, Clears can 240Hz, powerful new CQ Engine and High-Bright CineSpeed LED display, the L7300U creates sharp, bright, cinema-quality images, even with fast motion video. With the advanced Cloud TV services and features, experience enhanced content discovery now with real time streaming news, so you always know what’s going on. True social interaction features help you connect with friends and family, and mobile device interaction creates simple location free use. The included wireless keyboard with touchpad makes it faster and easier to surf the Internet through the TV’s open browser. Move up to supersized movies, entertainment and gaming with the L7300U series.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


Enjoy a smarter, more personalized TV experience with the Toshiba 65L7300U 65-Inch Smart LED HDTV. Equipped with Wi-Fi and HD connectivity, this modern cloud TV has a sleek profile and delivers stunning picture quality and a range of options for interacting with family, friends, and your favorite streaming sites. A full set of connections allows you to hook up laptops, mobile devices, USB drives, and more.

Delivers stunning picture quality and a wide range of entertainment options for the whole family. View larger.

Equipped with apps, Wi-Fi, and HD connectivity. View larger.

User-friendly HDTV gives you the flexibility to connect an array of devices. View larger.

SLIM CLOUD TV WITH BUILT-IN WI-FI
Designed to meet modern connection needs while offering brilliant high-contrast picture quality, the Toshiba 65L7300U grows with you with server-based upgradability. The included stand gives you the option of setting the television out or mounting it on a wall, so it's easily accommodated in virtually any space. Available in gunmetal finish with a thin bezel, this TV looks as great as the picture quality it delivers. Use the various input connections and built-in Wi-Fi it to connect to your favorite content, mobile devices, and people. 

SMART TV LETS YOU CONNECT WITH FRIENDS
This cloud TV lets you keep your family and friends close through messaging, event calendars, and photo sharing. KontrolTV apps even let you play games with family and friends using your mobile devices as controllers, and a Skype feature enables free video calls using an optional camera (sold separately). 

You can also kick back and stream your favorite movies and TV shows from Netflix, Hulu Plus, VUDU HD Movies, VUDU Apps, YouTube, and more. Need to surf the Internet or check your email during the commercial? This convenient TV has a built-in browser so you can do it all from the comfort of the couch. 

The 65L7300U television comes with a wireless keyboard with a built-in touchpad for easier, faster browsing. For more control options, a Universal System Blaster is included, so you can control all your audio and video devices using the remote. 

MOBILE INTERACTIVITY AND APPS
The Toshiba 65L7300U allows you to connect your Android or iOS mobile device to display your small-screen content on the big screen. Enjoy the wide range of apps for movies, TV shows, music, online games, and social interaction features that come with purchase. 


CINEMA-QUALITY PICTURE AND SOUND
The features of this 1080p Full HD television take your viewing experience to a new level, starting with the energy-efficient LED backlight that delivers bright, sharp contrast. An AutoView component automatically adjusts picture settings based on light conditions, while built-in ColorMaster technology brings pictures to life and gives you complete six-color control of hue, saturation, and brightness. 

This model also includes a High-Bright CineSpeed LED display for faster, brighter visuals and a more natural big-screen picture, a ClearScan 240 Hz component that doubles the refresh rate on fast motion video, and a CQ engine for powerful video processing. For the clearest picture possible, the CQ engine employs UltraClear Dynamic Noise Reduction technology that filters out visual noise without decreasing picture sharpness. 

And for an enriched audio experience, this HDTV is built with the Audyssey Premium Television suite of technologies that work together to deliver clear, well-balanced sound--ideal for getting the full experience of action movies, musical performances, and audio-enhanced games. 

SLEEK, MODERN DESIGN WITH MULTIPLE INPUTS
With multiple input options, this user-friendly HDTV gives you the flexibility to connect with a range of devices. Four HDMI connections, a component video input, two USB video ports, a high-def PC port, and built-in Wi-Fi and Intel Wireless Display allow you to hook it up to a Full Jack Pack or connect external speakers, AV receivers, flash drives, PCs, laptops, and mobile devices. The USB port allows you to connect a USB drive to enjoy slideshows, video, and music without hooking up your computer--a handy solution if you are planning to wall-mount the screen. 

TWO MODES FOR MULTIPURPOSE USE
The Toshiba 65L7300U is equipped with two modes--Dynamic Picture Mode and Game Mode. 

Delivering maximum clarity and color saturation, Dynamic Picture Mode lets you fully enjoy the intricate graphics of video games, animated films, and visual input from your laptop. Game Mode decreases controller delay for faster gaming action, while GameTimer offers parents the option of setting time limits for video game play. 

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
Toshiba 65L7300U 65-Inch Smart LED HDTV, wireless QWERTY keyboard with touchpad, illuminated universal remote control with batteries (2 AAA), IR Blaster cable, resource guide, quick start guide, and warranty. 

TOSHIBA 65L7300U 65-INCH 1080P 240HZ SMART LED HDTV WITH BUILT-IN WIFI
AT A GLANCE:
 * Modern cloud HDTV with built-in Wi-Fi
 * CineSpeed and ClearScan technology for sharp picture quality
 * Mobile device interactivity and social interaction features
 * Includes wireless keyboard with built-in touchpad
 * Server-based upgradability for future growth

Designed with a sleek, compact profile. View larger.
